text: Events from the year 1991 in Argentina ==Incumbents== * President: Carlos Menem * Vice president: Eduardo Duhalde ==Events== *26 March - Argentina signs the Treaty of Asunción with Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay, establishing the South Common Market (Mercosur). ==Births== *7 October - Brenda Asnicar, actress and singer *10 October - Lali Espósito, actress, singer, dancer and model *11 December - Gastón Soffritti, actorWebsite of Gastón Soffritti . Gastonsoffritti.com.ar. Retrieved on 2013-01-13. ==Deaths== *24 February - Héctor Rial, Argentinian footballer (born 1928) ==See also== *List of Argentine films of 1991 ==References== ==External links== Category:Years of the 20th century in Argentina Argentina Category:1990s in Argentina Argentina
title: 1991 in Argentina
